Text: Does anyone know if this works or if it's fake? I really don;t want spyware

This expires if actual date is indicated in PC. It will work if the date is changed to the release date of this torrent. However, once you change date back it will give you  a expired key error. Does any one have a fix for this?

Use CopyTrans Manager Free Version for now until someone manages to solve this:

http://www.copytrans.net/copytransmanager.php

Yes, it's a pain to switch to another program to sync your iPod, and there are a few limitations to the free version... BUT it will sync your MP3's without screwing up the MP3 tag data.
